post.body: FINNALLY i am able to login!

comment.body:
OKay did not know it autoposted
How do i upload a image?
Seems like a great idea! maybe check the `users.json` file for a zeroid, if not, go to the page by default. if there is, go to zeronetwork.bit

@Eltheal: one of the key details needed for the app to work is large storage, atleast 2gb free just for the app, 
and having things on clearnet is NOT a good idea, because zeronet is never supposed to go on clearnet

@Realjohndoe: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.canews.zeronet try this app, while it makes things super easy, it still needs some development, like the built in browser needs some ui adjustments, but it works pretty good, the other one https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.mkg20001.zeronet works as a standard zeronet install, but the ui is totally fucked (it works, just not as good as one would want)
@Astrr: Yeah no, that would be a bad idea,
@Realjohndoe: you can use i2p for that? huh,
the problem with aether, not alot of people actually use it
As fast as your internet will allow, assuming a seeder for the site has faster internet than you
